channel.title: sa on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in sa on funPlantGenes

item.title: Asr6;OsASR6
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g73250 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0963600 Gene Symbol: Asr6 OsASR6 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: BdWRKY38
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi2g30695 Gene Symbol: BdWRKY38 Gene Name: Genome: Bd21 reference genome Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: BdWRKY38 is required for the incompatible interaction of Brachypodium distachyon with the necrotrophic fungus Rhizoctonia solani.

item.title: BdWRKY44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi2g44270 Gene Symbol: BdWRKY44 Gene Name: Genome: Bd21 reference genome Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: Demonstrated that Bd3-1, an accession of the model grass Brachypodium distachyon, is resistant to R.

item.title: CaARF9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana00g000236 Gene Symbol: CaARF9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Demonstrate that an auxin response factor, CaARF9, has dual roles in enhancing the immune resistance to Ralstonia solanacearum infection and in retarding plant growth by repressing the expression of its target genes as exemplified by Casmc4, CaLBD37, CaAPK1b and CaRROP1.

item.title: CaASR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaASR1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaASR1 promotes salicylic acid- but represses jasmonic acid-dependent signaling to enhance the resistance of Capsicum annuum to bacterial wilt by modulating CabZIP63.

item.title: CaC3H14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaC3H14 Gene Name: zinc finger CCCH domain-containing protein 14 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaC3H14 encoding a tandem CCCH zinc finger protein is directly targeted by CaWRKY40 and positively regulates the response of pepper to inoculation by Ralstonia solanacearum.

item.title: CaHY5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA03g10440 ; apana08g000273 Gene Symbol: CaHY5 Gene Name: hypocotyl5 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Red light induces salicylic acid accumulation by activating CaHY5 to enhance pepper resistance against Phytophthora capsici.

item.title: CaWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaWRKY1 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Capsicum annuum WRKY protein CaWRKY1 is a negative regulator of pathogen defense.

item.title: CmNPR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: c81720_g1 Gene Symbol: CmNPR1 Gene Name: nonexpressor of pathogenesis-related gene 1 Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmWRKY15-like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmWRKY15-like Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Isolated CmWRKY6–1 from chrysanthemum ‘Jinba’ and identified it as a transcriptional repressor localized in the nucleus via subcellular localization and transcriptional activation assays.

item.title: CpPI
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CpPI Gene Name: B-class MADS-box protein PI Genome: Species: Carica papaya Functional Descriptions: CpPI is the ortholog of the Arabidopsis gene PI, the CpTM6-1 and CpTM6-2 loci are representatives of the paralogous TM6 lineage that contain paleoAP3 motifs unlike the euAP3 gene observed in Arabidopsis.

item.title: CsbZIP63
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsGy2G003130 Gene Symbol: CsbZIP63 Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber (Gy14) v2 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsbZIP63 and CsLRR1 play a role in the response of cucumber to PM infection and in the signaling pathways mediated by SA.

item.title: CsKPI2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsKPI2 Gene Name: Kunitz protease inhibitor 2 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: The overall findings suggest that the transcriptional divergence of KPI genes after duplication led to the specialized role of CsKPI1 in the physiological response to insect stress; the functional conservation between CsKPI2 and CsKPI3 confers resistance to pathogen infection in tea plant.

item.title: CsKPI3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsKPI3 Gene Name: Kunitz protease inhibitor 3 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: The overall findings suggest that the transcriptional divergence of KPI genes after duplication led to the specialized role of CsKPI1 in the physiological response to insect stress; the functional conservation between CsKPI2 and CsKPI3 confers resistance to pathogen infection in tea plant.

item.title: CsLRR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsGy5G016190 Gene Symbol: CsLRR1 Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber (Gy14) v2 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: A single-nucleotide substitution in the Leucine-Rich-Repeat-only gene CsLRR1 confers powdery mildew resistance in cucumber.

item.title: CsMYB96
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs5g10670.1 Gene Symbol: CsMYB96 Gene Name: R2R3 MYB transcription factor 96 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYB96 confers resistance to water loss in citrus fruit by simultaneous regulation of water transport and wax biosynthesis.

item.title: CsPM5.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa5M471600 Gene Symbol: CsPM5.2 Gene Name: Powdery mildew 5.

item.title: CsRDR1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRDR1a Gene Name: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase 1a Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The expression of all four CsRDR1 genes was induced by virus infection, after which the expression level of CsRDR1b increased 10–20-fold in several virus-resistant cucumber cultivars and in a broad virus-resistant transgenic cucumber line expressing a high level of transgene small RNAs, all without alteration in salicylic acid (SA) levels.

item.title: CsRDR1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRDR1b Gene Name: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase 1b Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The expression of all four CsRDR1 genes was induced by virus infection, after which the expression level of CsRDR1b increased 10–20-fold in several virus-resistant cucumber cultivars and in a broad virus-resistant transgenic cucumber line expressing a high level of transgene small RNAs, all without alteration in salicylic acid (SA) levels.

item.title: CsRDR1c1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRDR1c1 Gene Name: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase 1c Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The expression of all four CsRDR1 genes was induced by virus infection, after which the expression level of CsRDR1b increased 10–20-fold in several virus-resistant cucumber cultivars and in a broad virus-resistant transgenic cucumber line expressing a high level of transgene small RNAs, all without alteration in salicylic acid (SA) levels.

item.title: CsRDR1c2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRDR1c2 Gene Name: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase 1c2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The expression of all four CsRDR1 genes was induced by virus infection, after which the expression level of CsRDR1b increased 10–20-fold in several virus-resistant cucumber cultivars and in a broad virus-resistant transgenic cucumber line expressing a high level of transgene small RNAs, all without alteration in salicylic acid (SA) levels.

item.title: CsSH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA002405 Gene Symbol: CsSH1 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsSH2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA027220 Gene Symbol: CsSH2 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsWAKL08
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs9g14540 Gene Symbol: CsWAKL08 Gene Name: Wall-associated receptor-like kinase 8 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsWAKL08, a pathogen-induced wall-associated receptor-like kinase in sweet orange, confers resistance to citrus bacterial canker via ROS control and JA signaling.

item.title: CsWRKY70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsWRKY70 Gene Name: Genome: C.

item.title: DTH2;OsCOL9
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g49230 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0724000 Gene Symbol: DTH2 OsCOL9 OsCCT08 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: FaGT6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaGT6 Gene Name: UDP-glucose glucosyltransferase6 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Two glucosyltransferases, FaGT6 and FaGT7, were cloned from a strawberry (Fragaria×ananassa) cDNA library and the full-length open reading frames were amplified by rapid amplification of cDNA ends.

item.title: FaGT7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaGT7 Gene Name: UDP-glucose glucosyltransferase7 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Two glucosyltransferases, FaGT6 and FaGT7, were cloned from a strawberry (Fragaria×ananassa) cDNA library and the full-length open reading frames were amplified by rapid amplification of cDNA ends.

item.title: GF14f;OsGF14f
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g50290 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0710800 Gene Symbol: GF14f OsGF14f Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: GhGPA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhGPA Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A cotton G-protein α-subunit-encoding gene (GhGPA) was isolated from Verticillium wilt-resistant Gossypium hirsutum (upland cotton) cv.

item.title: GhMPK20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMPK20 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase 20 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The cotton MAPK kinase GhMPK20 negatively regulates resistance to Fusarium oxysporum by mediating the MKK4–MPK20–WRKY40 cascade.

item.title: GhSAMDC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSAMDC Gene Name: S-adenosylmethionine decarboxylase Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton S-adenosylmethionine decarboxylase(GhSAMDC)-mediated spermine biosynthesis is required for salicylic acid- and leucine-correlated signaling in the defense response to Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GhSPMS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSPMS Gene Name: Spm synthase Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton S-adenosylmethionine decarboxylase(GhSAMDC)-mediated spermine biosynthesis is required for salicylic acid- and leucine-correlated signaling in the defense response to Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GhSSI2-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-A Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhSSI2-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-B Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhSSI2-C
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-C Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhTINY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GhD06G0642 Gene Symbol: GhTINY2 Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Functional Genomics Database Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Orchestration of plant development and defense by indirect crosstalk of salicylic acid and brassinosteorid signaling via transcription factor GhTINY2.

item.title: GhWIN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A07G036100 Gene Symbol: GhWIN2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The cotton GhWIN2 gene activates the cuticle biosynthesis pathway and influences the salicylic and jasmonic acid biosynthesis pathways.

item.title: GhWRKY70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY70 Gene Name: Gossypium hirsutum cultivar Zhongzhimian 2 WRKY transcription factor 70 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The cotton WRKY transcription factor GhWRKY70 negatively regulates the defense response against Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GhZFP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhZFP1 Gene Name: CCCH-type zinc finger protein 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhZFP1, a novel CCCH-type zinc finger protein from cotton, enhances salt stress tolerance and fungal disease resistance in transgenic tobacco by interacting with GZIRD21A and GZIPR5.

item.title: GmBTB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmBTB Gene Name: BTB/POZ domain-containing nuclear protein Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmBTB/GmPOZ, a novel BTB/POZ domain-containing nuclear protein, positively regulates the response of soybean to Phytophthora sojae infection.

item.title: GmDR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10g094800 Gene Symbol: GmDR1 Gene Name: Glycine max disease resistance 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Transient expression of the green fluorescent protein fused GmDR1 protein in soybean leaves showed that it is a plasma membrane protein.

item.title: GmERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmERF3 Gene Name: EREBP/AP2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the soybean GmERF3 gene, an AP2/ERF type transcription factor for increased tolerances to salt, drought, and diseases in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: GmPAP2.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma06g028100 Gene Symbol: GmPAP2.1 Gene Name: purple acid phosphatase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of purple acid phosphatase GmPAP2.

item.title: GmPOZ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmPOZ Gene Name: BTB/POZ domain-containing nuclear protein Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmBTB/GmPOZ, a novel BTB/POZ domain-containing nuclear protein, positively regulates the response of soybean to Phytophthora sojae infection.

item.title: GmSIZ1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.12g071300 Gene Symbol: GmSIZ1a Gene Name: SUMO E3 ligase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: SUMO E3 Ligases GmSIZ1a and GmSIZ1b regulate vegetative growth in soybean.

item.title: GmSIZ1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.U020100 Gene Symbol: GmSIZ1b Gene Name: SUMO E3 ligase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: SUMO E3 Ligases GmSIZ1a and GmSIZ1b regulate vegetative growth in soybean.

item.title: GmTNL16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G135500 Gene Symbol: GmTNL16 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Cloned and overexpressed Glyma.

item.title: GmTOC1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmTOC1b Gene Name: TIMING OF CAB EXPRESSION 1b Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Homozygous GmTOC1b mutants exhibited increased tolerance to SMV strain SC3 due to the activation of programmed cell death triggered by a hypersensitive response.

item.title: GmWRKY40
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13G370100 Gene Symbol: GmWRKY40 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmWRKY40 activates the expression of defense-related genes involved in the SA pathway.

item.title: ICS1;OsVDAC1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os09g19734 RAPdb gene ID: Os09g0361500 ,Os09g0361400 Gene Symbol: ICS1 OsVDAC1 OsICS1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: LeFAD7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeFAD7 Gene Name: omega-3 fatty acid desaturase7 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Loss of Function of FATTY ACID DESATURASE7 (LeFAD7) in Tomato Enhances Basal Aphid Resistance in a Salicylate-Dependent Manner.

item.title: LeGGPS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeGGPS1 Gene Name: geranylgeranyl pyrophosphate synthase1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeGGPS1 was predominantly expressed in leaf tissue and LeGGPS2 in ripening fruit and flower tissue.

item.title: LeGGPS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeGGPS2 Gene Name: geranylgeranyl pyrophosphate synthase2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeGGPS1 was predominantly expressed in leaf tissue and LeGGPS2 in ripening fruit and flower tissue.

item.title: LLS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb003760 Gene Symbol: LLS1 Gene Name: LETHAL LEAF SPOT1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: LrABCF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LrABCF1 Gene Name: ATP-binding cassette transporter1 Genome: Species: Lilium regale Functional Descriptions: LrABCF1, a GCN-type ATP-binding cassette transporter from Lilium regale, is involved in defense responses against viral and fungal pathogens.

item.title: MdVQ37
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD15G1043200 Gene Symbol: MdVQ37 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MeHSP90.9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me18G012200 Gene Symbol: MeHSP90.9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: This study highlights the dual regulation of SA and auxin biosynthesis by MeHSP90.

item.title: MFP;AIM1

item.title: NaPME1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaPME1 Gene Name: putative pectin methylesterase Genome: Species: Nicotiana attenuata Functional Descriptions: Pectin methylesterase NaPME1 contributes to the emission of methanol during insect herbivory and to the elicitation of defence responses in Nicotiana attenuata.

item.title: PbATL18
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr007980.1 Gene Symbol: PbATL18 Gene Name: E3 ubiquitin ligase Genome: Species: Pyrus betulifolia Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor PbbZIP4 is targeted for proteasome-mediated degradation by the ubiquitin ligase PbATL18 to influence pear’s resistance to Colletotrichum fructicola by regulating the expression of PbNPR3.

item.title: PbbZIP4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GWHPAAYT014255 Gene Symbol: PbbZIP4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus betulifolia Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor PbbZIP4 is targeted for proteasome-mediated degradation by the ubiquitin ligase PbATL18 to influence pear’s resistance to Colletotrichum fructicola by regulating the expression of PbNPR3.

item.title: SRC7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16g214300 Gene Symbol: SRC7 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: SRC7 possessed broad-spectrum antiviral activity toward several plant viruses including SMV, plum pox virus, potato virus Y, and tobacco mosaic virus.

item.title: StbZIP61
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StbZIP61 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The potato transcription factor StbZIP61 regulates dynamic biosynthesis of salicylic acid in defense against Phytophthora infestans infection.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sotub03g022560 Gene Symbol: StMKK5 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The potato StMKK5-StSIPK module enhances resistance to Phytophthora pathogens through activating the salicylic acid and ethylene signalling pathways.

item.title: StPTP1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMC400045325 Gene Symbol: StPTP1a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Description: StPTP1a negatively regulates potato immunity and represses SA-related gene expression.
